Package fi.metropolia.group8.model

Class DataModel

java.lang.Object
fi.metropolia.group8.model.DataModel
public class DataModel
extends java.lang.Object
Builds lists of data from database for other components to use. Used as a global singleton instance.

    • loadAliasData

      public void loadAliasData()
      Refreshes alias list from database

    • saveAliasData

      public void saveAliasData​(Alias alias)
      Sends modified alias to the DAO for saving. Calls event log manager.
      Parameters:
      alias - alias to be updated in database

    • createAlias

      public void createAlias​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, int equity)
      Creates a new alias object and sends it to the DAO. Also calls event log manager.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the alias
      description - description for the alias
      equity - amount of money the new alias has

    • deleteAlias

      public void deleteAlias​(Alias alias)
      Sends an alias object to the DAO for deletion. Also calls event log manager.
      Parameters:
      alias - alias to be deleted

    • loadLoanData

      public void loadLoanData()
      Refreshes loan list from database

    • createLoan

      public Loan createLoan​(Alias alias, float value, Victim victim, java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.time.LocalDate dueDate, float interest)
      Creates a new loan and sends it to the DAO. Notifies event log manager.
      Parameters:
      alias - Alias that issued the loan
      value - THe value that the victim owes
      victim - Debtor
      startDate - Start Date for the loan
      dueDate - Due date for the loan
      interest - Interest of the new loan
      Returns:
      Returns the new loan object

    • saveLoanData

      public void saveLoanData​(Loan loan)
      Sends modified loan the DAO to be updated. Notifies event log manager.
      Parameters:
      loan - loan to be updated in database

    • deleteLoan

      public void deleteLoan​(Loan loan)
      Sends a loan object the DAO for deletion. Notifies event log manager.
      Parameters:
      loan - alias to be deleted

    • loadUserData

      public void loadUserData()
      Refreshes user list from database

    • saveUserData

      public void saveUserData​(User user)
      Sends modified user to data access object to be updated
      Parameters:
      user - user to be updated in database

    • createUser

      public User createUser​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new user object and sends it to the data access object to be added to database
      Parameters:
      name - name of the user
      Returns:
      user object

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser​(User user)
      Deletes the user object from database
      Parameters:
      user - User to be deleted

    • loadVictimData

      public void loadVictimData()
      Refreshes victim list from database

    • saveVictimData

      public void saveVictimData​(Victim victim)
      Sends modified victim object to the DAO
      Parameters:
      victim - victim to be updated in database

    • createVictim

      public Victim createVictim​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String description)
      Creates and sends a new victim object to the DAO. Notifies event log manager.
      Parameters:
      name - victim's name
      address - victim's address
      description - description for the victim
      Returns:
      returns the new victim object

    • createGeneratedVictim

      public Victim createGeneratedVictim​(GeneratedVictim generatedVictim)
      Creates a new victim object from a randomly generated GeneratedVictim object created by the VictimGenerator class. Sends the new victim object to the DAO. Notifies event log manager.
      Parameters:
      generatedVictim - random generated GeneratedVictim object
      Returns:
      returns the new victim object

    • deleteVictim

      public void deleteVictim​(Victim victim)
      Deletes a victim from database. Notifies event log manager.
      Parameters:
      victim - Victim to be deleted
